page.title: 17PONTINS BROADREEDS,SELSEY,2
page.content: We were excited when the{Manager invited us to lunch.We were met by the {Entertainments Manager}who showed us the{dining room.}It was enormous _ nearer the size of our football field but narrower.There were 699 people having lunch at the same time.They sat down at rectangular tables with a number on.The tablecloth was a different colour for breakfast,lunch and dinner.For{dinner}there are candles. We had a lot of cutlery laid out and a small plate with a roll.A waitress served{lunch.}We had soup, then because it was Friday it was fish day. The fish came in on a big silver dish _ it had slices of lemon on it.One girl didn't like fish so she had an enormous salad.We all loved the dessert,ice-cream covered with chocolate.
